verses.verse: After <WG3326> these things<WG5023> I saw<WG1492>, and<WG2532> behold<WG2400>, a door<WG2374> opened<WG455> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> the first<WG4413> voice<WG5456> that<WG3739> I heard<WG191>, a voice as<WG5613> of a trumpet<WG4536> speaking<WG2980> with<WG3326> me<WG1700>, one saying<WG3004>, Come up<WG305> hither<WG5602>, and<WG2532> I will show<WG1166> thee<WG4671> the things<WG5023> which<WG3739> must<WG1163> come to pass<WG1096> hereafter<WG3326>.

<WG2532> Straightway<WG2112> I was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151>: and<WG2532> behold<WG2400>, there was a throne<WG2362> set<WG2749> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> one sitting<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the throne<WG2362>;

and <WG2532> he<WG3588> that sat<WG2521> was<WG2258> to look upon<WG3706> like<WG3664> a jasper<WG2393> stone<WG3037> and<WG2532> a sardius<WG4555>: and<WG2532> there was a rainbow<WG2463> round about<WG2943> the throne<WG2362>, like<WG3664> an emerald<WG4664> to look upon<WG3706>.

And <WG2532> round about<WG2943> the throne<WG2362> were four<WG5064> and<WG2532> twenty<WG1501> thrones<WG2362>: and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the thrones<WG2362> I saw<WG1492> four<WG5064> and<WG2532> twenty<WG1501> elders<WG4245> sitting<WG2521>, arrayed<WG4016> in<WG1722> white<WG3022> garments<WG2440>; and2532, 2192 on<WG1909> their<WG846> heads<WG2776> crowns<WG4735> of gold<WG5552>.

And <WG2532> out of<WG1537> the throne<WG2362> proceed<WG1607> lightnings<WG796> and<WG2532> voices<WG5456> and<WG2532> thunders<WG1027>. And<WG2532> there were seven<WG2033> lamps<WG2985> of fire<WG4442> burning<WG2545> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362>, which<WG3739> are<WG1526> the seven<WG2033> Spirits<WG4151> of God<WG2316>;

and <WG2532> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362>, as it were a sea<WG2281> of glass<WG5193> like<WG3664> a crystal<WG2930>; and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the throne<WG2362>, and<WG2532> round about<WG2945> the throne<WG2362>, four<WG5064> living creatures<WG2226> full of<WG1073> eyes<WG3788> before<WG1715> and<WG2532> behind<WG3693>.

And <WG2532> the first<WG4413> creature<WG2226> was like<WG3664> a lion<WG3023>, and<WG2532> the second<WG1208> creature<WG2226> like<WG3664> a calf<WG3448>, and<WG2532> the third<WG5154> creature<WG2226> had<WG2192> a face<WG4383> as<WG5613> of a man<WG444>, and<WG2532> the fourth<WG5067> creature<WG2226> was like<WG3664> a flying<WG4072> eagle<WG105>.

and <WG2532> the four<WG5064> living creatures<WG2226>, having<WG2192> each<WG303> one<WG2596> of them<WG1438> six<WG1803> wings<WG4420>, are full<WG1073> of eyes<WG3788> round about<WG2943> and<WG2532> within<WG2081>: and<WG2532> they have<WG2192> no<WG3756> rest<WG372> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night<WG3571>, saying<WG3004>, Holy<WG40>, holy<WG40>, holy<WG40>, is the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316>, the Almighty<WG3841>, who was<WG2258> and<WG2532> who<WG3588> is<WG5607> and<WG2532> who is to come<WG2064>.

And <WG2532> when<WG3752> the<WG3588> living creatures<WG2226> shall give<WG1325> glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> thanks<WG2169> to him<WG3588> that sitteth<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362>, to him<WG3588> that liveth<WG2198> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>,

the four<WG5064> and<WG2532> twenty<WG1501> elders<WG4245> shall fall down<WG4098> before<WG1799> him<WG3588> that sitteth<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362>, and<WG2532> shall worship<WG4352> him<WG3588> that liveth<WG2198> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>, and<WG2532> shall cast<WG906> their<WG846> crowns<WG4735> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362>, saying<WG3004>,
